title: Express Talk: Xipe Totec
hero_caption: Ritual Impersonator of the Deity Xipe Totec, 1450/1500. Possibly central Veracruz, Mexico. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Samuel A. Marx.&nbsp;
description:
Join educator Sam Anderson-Ramos for a brief reflection on Ritual Impersonator of the Deity Xipe Totec, a dramatic Aztec (Mexica) figure that exemplifies the often intense, and sometimes savage, nature of worship.
